name: Zera: Myths Awaken
description: Zera: Myths Awaken is being developed by a small, indie team led called RetrauxSpective Entertainment. Initially, it was conceived as a sequel to the original Spyro the Dragon trilogy for the Sony PlayStation, but with the creator receiving a cease and desist from Activision in September of 2018, the game was reworked into something very much it's own; featuring an original plot, new characters, locations and game mechanics.
